sources.title: An Inspector Calls
sources.description: Title: An Inspector Calls Summary: When a young girl is found dead an inspector is sent to investigate a prosperous Yorkshire household. It emerges that each member of the family has a guilty secret - each one is partly responsible for her death. Directed by: Guy Hamilton Actors: Alastair Sim, Arthur Young, Olga Lindo Production Company: British Lion Film Corporation Release Date: 18 March 1955 (France) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Color: Black and White Set in 1912, an upper crust English family's dinner is interrupted when a police inspector brings news of a girl known to everyone present having died in suspicious circumstances. It seems each member of the family could have had a hand in her death. But who is the mysterious Inspector and what can he want of them? This was originally a West End play.

metadata.Plot: Set in 1912, an upper crust English family's dinner is interrupted when a police inspector brings news of a girl known to everyone present having died in suspicious circumstances.
